description.value: This constrained Composition resource represents a Mental Health Document Header Composition.

purpose.value: This constrained Composition resource represents a discharge summary to GP for mental health adult patients.

copyright.value: Copyright © 2018 Health and Social Care Information Centre. NHS Digital is the trading name of the Health and Social Care Information Centre.

description.value: A set of codes to classify the type of document.
This list of codes represents the main clinical acts being documented. It uses a code from any vocabulary to describe the type of service event. The vocabulary SnomedCT is a preferred vocabulary.
A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system which represents the type of section.
